wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Williams (born 1964) is an English tailor and fashion designer the establisher of his brand,  Terence Trout, tailoring house Bespoke HQ. He previously worked with Giorgio Armani, Calvin Klein and DKNY, and he ran the Paul Costelloe Menswear line.
